text: Avvare nakarankalin taykkum, (makkavukkum atanaic curriyullavarrukkum accamutti eccarippatarkakavum, evvita cantekamuminri (yavarum) onru cerkkappatum nalaipparri accamutti eccarippatarkakavum, arapi poliyilana inta kur'anai nam umakku vahi'arivikkirom; oru kuttam cuvarkkattilum oru kuttam narakilum irukkum
